about.title: About Us
about.description: Khorramshahr Quranic Complex is an educational center specialized in teaching the Holy Quran and its sciences, established in 2010 with the aim of spreading Quranic culture and promoting the memorization and recitation of the Holy Quran. The complex includes a group of specialized teachers in Quranic sciences.

page.heroDescription: Explore our diverse programs in teaching the Holy Quran and its sciences
page.programsDescription: Khorramshahr Quranic Complex offers a variety of educational programs and courses in the field of the Holy Quran and its sciences, suitable for different age groups and educational levels.
page.registrationDescription: To register for any of our programs, please visit the complex headquarters or contact us by phone or email.
documents: A copy of personal ID or passport
Registration form (available at the complex headquarters or can be downloaded from our website)

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about Khorramshahr Quranic Complex, our mission, vision, and values
about.historyPara1: Khorramshahr Quranic Complex was established in 2010 through the initiative of a group of religious scholars and individuals interested in spreading Quranic sciences in the region.
about.historyPara2: The complex started with only two classrooms and a limited number of students, gradually expanding to become a comprehensive educational institution comprising numerous classrooms and modern educational facilities.
about.historyPara3: Over the years, hundreds of Quran memorizers have graduated from the complex, and it has become a leading center for teaching the Holy Quran and its sciences in the region.
about.missionText: At Khorramshahr Quranic Complex, we strive to spread the teachings of the Holy Quran and its sciences among community members, and to graduate a distinguished generation of Quran memorizers proficient in its recitation and applying its rulings, by providing outstanding educational programs led by a selection of specialized teachers.
about.visionText: We aspire for Khorramshahr Quranic Complex to be a leading educational institution at the regional level in the field of teaching the Holy Quran and its sciences, and to be a reliable reference in spreading Quranic culture and Islamic values in society.
about.valueMasteryText: We always strive to provide the highest levels of quality in education and training, and we are keen on mastering work in all its aspects.
about.valueRespectText: We believe in the importance of respecting all individuals regardless of their backgrounds and abilities, and we work to provide an educational environment based on mutual respect.
about.valueExcellenceText: We always strive for excellence in all our work, and we encourage our students to strive for excellence in their studies and lives.
about.valueInnovationText: We believe in the importance of innovation and renewal in teaching methods, and we always seek to develop our programs and teaching methods.
about.valueCooperationText: We believe in the importance of teamwork and cooperation among all members of the complex, including administration, teachers, students, and parents.
about.valueResponsibilityText: We take responsibility for our actions and always strive to achieve our goals with honesty and sincerity.
about.staffDescription: Khorramshahr Quranic Complex includes a selection of specialized teachers in Quranic sciences, recitation (Tajweed), and interpretation (Tafsir), in addition to a distinguished administrative team.
